item.title: Analog vs Digital Tools
item.description: How can we blur the line between digital and analog input? Analog is currently faster, but that’s largely due to failure in technology and building digital experiences. Analog Digital Workflow iPad The Dash Plus System The struggle to depict something gives you time to think into it....
